posts.postText:
1) Which server:Jailbreak
2) Offender's name:KHORNATE BERSERKER
3) Offender's SteamID:STEAM_0:1:27102928
4) Explain the situation in detail:The first round Kharn had guard, he RDM'd Stratos, who in turned slayed him and warned him to stop. The next round, he RDM'd three other people. Whilst RDM'ing, he kept using this troll statement "Blood for the Blood God!"
5) Were any specific server rules broken:RDM/Trolling/Minor player disrespect.
6) Any staff members on the server at the time of the offence:Nope
7) Proof:
 http://i162.photobucket.com/albums/t245/kennyd3333/Khornate1.jpg 
 http://i162.photobucket.com/albums/t245/kennyd3333/Khornate2.jpg 
 http://i162.photobucket.com/albums/t245/kennyd3333/Khornate3.jpg

Shoot sorry I ran off for a moment typing the very same ban request along with his friend.
